title: Implementation of Small and Micro Industries Leader and Entrepreneur Promotion Project (SMILE III) - Revolving Fund Loan Scheme
decision_details:
in terms of the provisions of the Loan Agreement between Japan Bank for 
International Cooperation (JBIC) and the Government of Sri Lanka, the proceeds 
of the Small and Micro Industries Leader and Entrepreneur Promotion Project 
(SMILE III) should be used as a Revolving Fund to grant loans to Small and 
Medium Scale Entrepreneurs.  The General Treasury has allocated Rs. 300 
million for this year to implement SMILE III with funds available for the 
purpose in the Revolving Fund Account at the Central Bank.  The proposal made 
by Hon. Rishad Bathiudeen, Minister of Industry and Commerce, to implement 
the SMILE III Revolving Fund Loan Scheme and to provide loans to 
Participatory Credit Institutions, was approved by the Cabinet.
